item.title: Mentioned by MarketWatch (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Launches Recreational Fisheries Conservation ...
OTTAWA, ONTARIO, Jun 18, 2013 (Marketwired via COMTEX) -- Parliamentary Secretary Randy Kamp and Member of Parliament Robert Sopuck, on behalf of the Honourable Keith Ashfield, Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, today announced that the Government is delivering on its commitment, as outlined in Economic Action Plan ... "The program will bring like-minded partners together and pool resources to support the common goal of conserving and protecting Canada's recreational fisheries," said MP Sopuck.
